name: qBitWebUI
description: A modern, fast, and beautiful web UI for qBittorrent built with React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features real-time torrent monitoring, drag-and-drop file uploads, magnet link support, file priority management, multiple themes, and keyboard navigation.
author: Maciejonos

form_fields.label: qBittorrent URL
form_fields.hint: Full URL to your qBittorrent instance (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:8080)
